about.title: ABOUT_
about.journey: MY JOURNEY IN TECHNOLOGY BEGAN WITH AN INSATIABLE CURIOSITY
about.description: While studying at UTFPR, I started diving deep into the web ecosystem. Today at Union, I work rebuilding MVPs from scratch, crafting interfaces that make sense — visually, technically, and for the people using them.
about.evolution: IF THERE IS ONE WORD THAT DEFINES ME, IT IS
about.educationContent:
SYSTEMS ANALYSIS & DEVELOPMENT
UTFPR — Graduating Jul 2026

highlights: Rebuilt MVP front-end with Turborepo + Next.js
Elevated mobile NPS by 20% with responsive UIs
Cut fetch errors by 40% using tRPC contracts
Rebuilt MVP front-end with Turborepo + Next.js
Elevated mobile NPS by 20% with responsive UIs
Cut fetch errors by 40% using tRPC contracts
Monitored 150+ nightly jobs for Carrefour logistics
Automated critical scripts, reducing manual work by 35%
Built front-end (HTML/CSS/JS) and back-end (Spring Boot, Node.js)
Led back-end team in capstone project
Delivered RESTful APIs 2 weeks ahead of deadline

list.title: UNION MVP REBUILD
list.description: Rebuilt front-end MVP with Turborepo + Next.js, reducing First Contentful Paint by 35% (1.2s improvement)

list.title: RESPONSIVE UI SYSTEM
list.description: Implemented responsive UIs with Tailwind CSS and Class-Variance-Authority, elevating mobile NPS by 20%

list.title: TYPE-SAFE API LAYER
list.description: Developed typed contracts with tRPC and React Query (superjson), reducing fetch errors by 40%

list.title: E2E TEST AUTOMATION
list.description: Established Playwright E2E testing pipeline, increasing coverage from 60% to 90% and cutting regressions by 40%
